intro: Knautia arvernensis subsp. catalaunica, commonly known as the Catalan knautia, is a flowering plant native to the Iberian Peninsula. It belongs to the family Caprifoliaceae and is characterized by its clusters of pink to purple flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or grassy areas and is known for its attractive, fluffy blooms. It is a perennial herb that thrives in full sun and well-drained soil. Its botanical features make it a valuable addition to gardens and natural habitats.
